force.description: The input force to pull objects closer.

radmin.description: The wider (typically weaker) radius to be pulled in from.

radmax.description: The smaller (typically stronger) radius to be pulled in from.

appear.description: Time taken for the object to appear.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.

Extra.name: An object that pulls in other objects.
